document_data.caption: A map showing Achelar in northeast Halruaa.
document_data.name: Achelar
document_data.mainbody: '''Achelar''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Achelar lay in northeast Halruaa among the western foothills of the [[Muaraghal Mountains]]. The town marked a halfway point between the [[Nath]] in the north and [[Lake Maeru]] in the south.
